pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw:
Currently looking into a problem here. My test case is:

1. Insert a sphere
2. Follow the sphere using the right-mouse menu
3. Put the camera is static follow mode.
4. Apply a force to the sphere to make it move along the x-direction.

The camera will jump back and forth.
content.html:
Currently looking into a problem here. My test case is:

  1. Insert a sphere
  2. Follow the sphere using the right-mouse menu
  3. Put the camera is static follow mode.
  4. Apply a force to the sphere to make it move along the x-direction.

The camera will jump back and forth.
